greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} sigma(d) + 3*Sum_{2c|n} sigma(c).
link: J. S. Rutherford, The enumeration and symmetry-significant properties of derivative lattices, Act. Cryst. A48 (1992), 500-508. See Table 1, symmetry P2/m.
formula: Dirichlet g.f. (1+3/2^s)*zeta(s-1)*(zeta(s))^2. Dirichlet convolution of [1,3,0,0,0,0,0,...] and A007429.
maple: for d in t1 do if d mod 2 = 0 then t2:=t2+sigma(d/2); fi; od:
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[DivisorSigma[1, d] + 3 Boole[Mod[d, 2] == 0] DivisorSigma[1, d/2], {d, Divisors[n]}];
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 13 2009
